resources.string: The PNRStatusApp can be used to check the status of a valid PNR Number.

The PNRStatusApp can be used to check the status of a valid PNR Number.
 Check out the desktop version for more features.

 An active connection to the internet is necessary for proper functioning of this application.
 No part of the PNR Status Data retrieved is persisted by this application.

 Designed & developed by midhunhk@gmail.com
 http://aeonline.co.nr/
Add a PNR Number to begin.
